projects.name: Data Transfer and File Management System
achievements: Built a RESTful API to manage large-scale data transfers between Azure storage tiers
Leveraged Azure Data Movement Library to perform parallelized, chunked uploads
Enabled efficient multi-terabyte transfers to cheaper storage, cutting cloud costs significantly
Designed and developed a file management UI using React.js and Material UI
Created custom data structures to track folder hierarchies, file metadata, and upload progress efficiently
Delivered 130+ user stories in 50+ agile sprints; participated in planning, standups, and retrospectives
Collaborated with end users/stakeholders to gather requirements and deliver iterative updates
Created technical documentation for deployment, architecture, and user onboarding

projects.name: Legacy System Modernization
achievements: Modernized legacy Delphi apps into a modular .NET Core backend with React frontend
Improved system maintainability and reduced long-term support effort by 35% through backend consolidation
Optimized React UI with memoization, pagination, and custom search, reducing load times by 30%
Automated file processing with Python, cutting task time from 1 hour to 10 minutes
Solely developed and deployed backend, frontend, and automation components
Set up CI/CD pipeline for seamless deployments using Azure DevOps

projects.name: Financial Trading System
achievements: Led 5-member team to develop trading system using .NET and MySQL
Built custom stored procedures for trade execution and portfolio tracking
Implemented JWT authentication for secure user access and authorization

projects.name: Sales Forecasting & Dashboarding
achievements: Created an ML model for forecasting sales using Python, achieving 80% accuracy
Data Visualization using Power BI, creating interactive dashboards and reports that displayed key insights and trends for decision making
